thread.title: LOL: Smartphones now reacting to emotion

title: LOL: Smartphones now reacting to emotion
text:
Published By: CBS News: U.S. - Today 
Smartphones are now capable of reading our emotions and reacting to them, which may open up an extremely interesting world of possibilities...
